name: Koh Tao Simple Life Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay here. We came over Songkran, and all the staff were great at getting everyone involved and making sure they felt welcome. We also felt that the service we received wasn't any different from those that had signed up for diving courses and they even helped us out when we were trying to change rooms last minute during a busy week. (Decided we didn't want to be on the ground floor.)
reviews.title: Great Staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The town has been cleaned up pretty well after the flooding, however you can still see that a lot of work needs to be done on some of the smaller bungalows. As well, Sairee wasn't in the same shape after the flooding, but I'm sure it will get better with time and more clean up.
reviews.title: Simply fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only complaint would be about a group that was very loud long into the night at the property and I didn't get the impression that anyone was around to ask them to keep it down, even after many of the guests started yelling.
reviews.title: Relaxing stay in koh tao

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Aside from that I would totally recommend this property to anyone that wants to be close to everything and appreciates good friendly staff.
reviews.title: Good clean hotel, but forget breakfast, its bad.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Side note: a good place for sunset drinks is Fizz, which has the big green bean bag chairs near the beach, and if you miss western fare try Porto Bello for decent Italian food.
reviews.title: Pretty little gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Me and my family with small children stayed there in january 2011. We had booked 2 nights but ended up staying one more and then they were fully booked... Spent the first night in a room right next to the construction zone, but got to change to a higher floor and further away and it did not bother us there.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel, but a construction right next door

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The superior rooms are spacious and beautifully furnished. The bathroom is beautiful, but the floors get very slippery, and with all the level differences it can be dangerous if you don't pay attention. The balconys are nice, and we could sit out without getting bit by mosquitos.
reviews.title: Simple Life Awesome - but BEWARE Lomprayah Ferry

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was small, but ok. The restaurant had friendly staff, but they all should take a few english lessons along with the front desk staff.
reviews.title: Amazing place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Payed 3300 THB for 3 persons and a baby, incl breakfast.
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms, excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is not right at the beach, but it is just a couple of minutes away.
reviews.title: Good location, helpfull staff, would recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We are a family with two children (aged 10 and 12) and we just spent 4 days three nights at Simple Life Resort. The family room is spacious and clean and the staff is friendly. There is free wifi, which works all over the resort and in the rooms. The only downside is that it is about 5 minutes walk from the beach, but we can recommend it nonetheless.
reviews.title: Clean, Friendly and Spacious

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner & I stayed here for 4 nights Dec'10. It's a tricky one this to review, there's nothing wrong with the place, but I felt it was vastly overpriced when compared to other hotels of a similar standard if not better in Thailand. The rooms are spacious and comfy but the finishing isn't the standard you'd expect from a self-described "luxury resort", there are no tea/coffee making facilities in the rooms unless you stay in a deluxe room - this seems particularly tight, especially considering we've stayed mainly in guesthouses who provide free facilities for a tenth of the price of a room here.
reviews.title: Nice enough but too expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The breakfast is ok, the standard fayre really. I suppose I was expecting it to have a "wow" factor and it doesn't which was a disappointment.
reviews.title: great hotel for your money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: the resort has a great location, 2 minutes from the beach.rooms are clean, breakfast is nice.staff is nice but speaks very basic english.
reviews.title: Faultless... fantastic diving and great resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 4 days and did Open Water Course. Instructors were really good; they explained everything well and tried to make the more tedious parts of the course as entertaining as possible. Had a lot of fun on the dive boat (diving in and sunbathing) and went out with some of the staff afterwards, which was nice as I was travelling alone. Room was modern, really clean and in a prime loaction (2 minutes from the dive school), plus I got a discount on my dive course because I was staying at the resort. Hopefully, I will be returning to Koh Tao next year to do more diving, and I will definitely be staying at Simple Life. Five stars :)
reviews.title: You won't be disappointed, 5 mins from everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The new hotel, I do not know when opened, but the numbers seen. Got the price THB 1,350 per night (he lived in Superiore), I think the price is fair.
reviews.title: Good hotel on Sairee

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Plus hotel:
reviews.title: This is not a 4 star hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Good, big and clean rooms (we got a king bed + another single bed)
reviews.title: beautiful hotel, service lets it down at times

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: - Very convenient location - the center of Sairee Beach (10 meters from 7-11)
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay. Friendly staff, well planned and quiet resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: - Large and comfortable terrace
reviews.title: Friendly staff, excellent clean rooms

description: Luxury resort offering quality air conditioned accommodation on Koh Tao's popular Sairee Beach. Peaceful and private resort, with premier location with everything you need in close walking distance (beach, bars and restaurants, shops, ATMs, etc).
